casebody.data:
State
v.
Andrew Robert Holloway 454P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2016

Ms. Michele Goldman, Attorney at Law, For Holloway, Andrew Robert.

Mr. Scott T. Stroud, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Ted Bell, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of December 2016."
